TopicTitle: Tech tree doesnt open at a later tier if all science in previous ones is already unlocked when entering Research and Development building

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 2400G | GPU: AMD Radeon RX6700 | RAM: 32G

 

Entering the R+D 'building' always opens with level 1 highlighted. I've already (dedicated researcher that I am) unlocked everything in level 1. It would make more sense, given this fact, for the tree to open at level 2.

 

Just a 'nice to have' really, but thought I'd mention it all the same.

Edited December 25, 2023 by The Space Peacock
@Forrey, I edited your title a bit (for easy finding of your bug report in the search function)
